name: Overlord's New Mansion: Concept
description: One of the early versions of the game 'Overlord's New Mansion'.
instructions: Move with <kbd>A</kbd> and <kbd>D</kbd>, jump with <kbd>W</kbd>, attack with <kbd>F</kbd>, dash by pressing <kbd>F</kbd> mid-air. Spawn monsters using keys <kbd>1</kbd> to <kbd>5</kbd>.
